bug.author: valtheval
bug.description: Hello, It looks like frequency is not calculated anymore. When I output a profile of a dataset all the frequency values are set at 0.0% (see image attached) Do you have the same issue ? <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/24987833/36218672-77589274-11b5-11e8-8236-2873c8079e7f.png></denchmark-link>

comments.comment: Yes, I have the same issue.
I have also problems with frequency <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/32418695/39881572-019bf14e-548a-11e8-8d0b-64e1cae9d39a.png></denchmark-link>
This problem seems to be resolved in v2.0.0, please reopen if the problem resurfaces.
